gold.user: User wants to retrieve all documents from the 'myIndex' index to display them on the frontend.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of documents in the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User is adding a new document to 'myIndex' with title and content fields.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new document in the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User wants to update an existing document or create it if it doesn't exist in 'myIndex'.
gold.ideal: Updates the document if it exists, otherwise creates a new one in 'myIndex'.

gold.user: User wants to remove all documents from 'myIndex' for a fresh start.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes all documents from the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User is fetching documents from an external source to add to 'myIndex'.
gold.ideal: Successfully fetches and adds documents to the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User wants to delete a batch of documents from 'myIndex' based on their IDs.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the specified batch of documents from 'myIndex'.

gold.user: User is removing a specific document from 'myIndex' using its ID.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the specified document from 'myIndex'.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a specific document with ID '123' from 'myIndex'.
gold.ideal: Returns the document with ID '123' from the 'myIndex' index.

gold.user: User is deleting a specific document with ID '123' from 'myIndex'.
gold.ideal: Successfully removes the document with ID '123' from 'myIndex'.
